summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2204, for the improvement of 12th Avenue West from West Garfield Street to West Howe Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with all necessary cross walks, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 22116 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
